notes: It's the [[Bonelords]]' Boss. It can cause [[Death Damage]] and all different kinds of [[Magical Damage]]. Always spawns with 3 [[Bonelord]]s and 2 [[Elder Bonelord]]s near it. When the Evil Eye is present in Hellgate, large clusters of Bonelords and Elder Bonelords (groups of 5 or 6) that are not normally present appear.
sounds: Inferior creatures, bow before my power!
name: The Evil Eye
strategy:
'''[[Knight]]s''' should rush in and kill it fast if you have no shooters. It has no [[Melee]] attack, so it will continue to use its distance attacks when you are up close. Be especially careful of the many [[Summon]]s, and use [[Berserk]] to kill them if necessary. Using a [[Stealth Ring]] may be useful to avoid the [[Demon Skeleton]]s' extra damage.
'''[[Paladin]]s''' Stay diagonal, hit them with your weapon, and [[exori san]]. Use potions if your health is low.
'''[[Mage]]s''' should use their wand to kill him. Avoid or ignore the summons and kill '''The Evil Eye''' first unless you are taking too much damage. It might be useful to run in circles to avoid getting hurt by the summoned [[Demon Skeleton]]s and [[Ghost]]s. Also, using [[Invisible]] or a [[Stealth Ring]] might be useful to avoid the summons' damage.
